name: ShootEmBug
description:
NOTE: It's shared at 09/10 23:56 but I forgot to publish the game

NOTE2: Original version has problems. But I fixed.

In this game, you will accompany the adventure of the brave Captain Santiago. On this adventure in the year 2102, Captain Santiago was sent to Earth as a vanguard to fight giant insects that have evolved so that the human race can return to Earth. Are you ready to join her in this adventure of Captain Santiago?

This project developed for 'Games Job Fair Autumn 2022 - Unreal Engine Programming Challenge'

Keyboard Instructions

Right Click: Move

Left Click: Gun Fire

Space: Flame Fire

R: Reloading
